description: Provide seamless integration with Smartling translation services to manage projects, files, jobs, and translation strings efficiently. Enhance your localization workflows with AI-powered insights, cost optimization, and auto-debugging features. Enable reliable and secure translation management directly from your MCP-compatible applications.

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: OpenAI API key for AI-powered features (optional but recommended)

SMARTLING_MCP_TOKEN.description: Smartling MCP Server token for premium features (machine translation, translation memory, style guides)

SMARTLING_ACCOUNT_ID.description: Default Smartling Account ID (optional but recommended)

SMARTLING_USER_SECRET.description: Smartling User Secret for API authentication

SMARTLING_USER_IDENTIFIER.description: Smartling User Identifier for API authentication

capabilities.name: smartling_machine_translate_text
capabilities.description: Translate text content using machine translation. Split long text into sentence-based chunks to preserve meaning and context - avoid breaking mid-sentence or splitting related content.

capabilities.name: smartling_machine_translate_file
capabilities.description: Translate file content using machine translation. Auto-detects source language if source_locale not provided.

capabilities.name: smartling_search_translation_memory
capabilities.description: Search translation memory for similar translations in a Smartling project. Useful for finding existing translations that match or are similar to source text.

capabilities.name: smartling_list_style_guides
capabilities.description: List style guides from the current Smartling account. Style guides are collections of rules about content formatting, writing tone, and style to ensure consistent translations.

capabilities.name: smartling_get_style_guide
capabilities.description: Get specific style guide by its unique identifier. Style guides contain rules about content formatting, writing tone, and style preferences.

capabilities.name: smartling_list_linguistic_packages
capabilities.description: List all linguistic packages from the current Smartling account. Linguistic packages are collections of translation resources including glossaries and style guides.

capabilities.name: smartling_get_linguistic_package
capabilities.description: Get specific linguistic package by its unique identifier. Linguistic packages contain settings that determine which linguistic assets (glossaries, style guides) are provided to translators.

capabilities.name: smartling_add_strings_to_job
capabilities.description: Add strings to an existing Smartling job by their hashcodes. Provides granular string-level control over job content.

capabilities.name: smartling_remove_strings_from_job
capabilities.description: Remove strings from an existing Smartling job by their hashcodes. Useful for cleaning up job content before authorization.

capabilities.name: smartling_list_projects_advanced
capabilities.description: List projects from the current Smartling account with advanced filtering. Supports filtering by name, project type, and archived status.

capabilities.name: smartling_get_project_details
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific project by its UID. Includes comprehensive project configuration and metadata.

capabilities.name: smartling_match_glossary_terms
capabilities.description: Match terms within specific glossaries against source and translation text. Useful for finding specific terms in source and translated strings for quality assurance.
